Claim: "A dog is shaking water off of itself."
Referring expressions: A dog, itself  The dog, water
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsShaking(a) and IsWater(b))) & (forall e (forall f ( IsShaking(e) ->  IsShakenOff(f)))) & (forall h (forall g ( IsShakenOff(g) ->  IsShaking(h))))) -> (exists c (exists d (IsShakenOff(c) and IsWater(d))))
